name: Estética Femenina Gabriela Gatto
description:
Responsive Site created on Wordpress, its main feature is that user can book or cancel any service
    from the website. It includes blog in order to show the latest news, a newsletter in order to offer some products
    and inform about events. The website is a PWA (progressive web application) which can work offline and it is another
    way to book a service without any effort from the user perspective.

name: Rosario Ventiladores
description:
Online Shop created on  Wordpress, it is a responsive site with newsletter. Products can be
    filtered by type of product and its label. Besides it has a news section and products can be updated in bulk.

name: Jorge A López
description:
Responsive Online Shop done with Wordpress, it is aimed to sell a wide range of products, so there
    are two types of filtering of them: filter by label or category. This site has a news section and customer can be offered special deals
    by a newsletter.

name: Cerrajería Pampa
description:
Single page website, focused on quick engaging by the user. Contact using Whatsapp, CSS for Print, seal is put to be used by a cell
    phone user who needs a locksmith service inmediately.

name: Industrias Titanio
description: Online portfolio of a wide range a products from a factory.

name: Vivero La Cumbrecita
description: Online catalog of products and plants for a big plant nursery
